name: SPACE JAM (itch) (ZAPdark)
description:
In this game, you will enter the world of outer space. 

Your job is to reach your destiny, and save yourself from various objects floating in space.

Each object doughed will give you a point, when you score 10 points you win.

If you crash, you lose.

Enjoy!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
